to prevent Childhood Nephrotic Syndrome ?,Researchers have not found a way to prevent childhood nephrotic syndrome when the cause is idiopathic or congenital.,NIDDK,Childhood Nephrotic Syndrome
What to do for Childhood Nephrotic Syndrome ?,"Children who have nephrotic syndrome may need to make changes to their diet, such as
                
- limiting the amount of sodium, often from salt, they take in each day  - reducing the amount of liquids they drink each day  - eating a diet low in saturat
